content: this cropped sweater is actually called bolero jacket in the book but it s not really a jacket i designed it to be a cropped sweater/shrug it comes longer to the waist in the back i did not like the outfit or jewelry they put with it in the book so i posted my own pictures here this is an intermediate pattern you can still buy the book top it off the pattern for this bolero is available free 1 when you go to the link it looks like the pattern is not there at first just scroll down and you ll see it it is also still available in stores like joann fabrics and lots of places on the web 1 http //www free-crochet com/detail html code=fc01226&cat_id=1
